sentenceList.speaker: Dorian Christon
sentenceList.text: It's almost eleven o'clock… Why hasn't Miss Annabelle arrived yet?

sentenceList.speaker: Dorian Christon
sentenceList.text: The carriage will be here soon...

sentenceList.speaker: Annabel Vesey
sentenceList.text: We're not going to miss the carriage, are we?

sentenceList.speaker: Dorian Christon
sentenceList.text: It's fine for now... but if you'd been five minutes later, that'd be a different story.

sentenceList.speaker: Annabel Vesey
sentenceList.text: You haven't been waiting long, have you, sir...? I'm really sorry.

sentenceList.speaker: Dorian Christon
sentenceList.text: I only just got here myself. This trip isn't for a case investigation, so there's no need to be so tense.

sentenceList.speaker: Annabel Vesey
sentenceList.text: But I've been looking forward to this since last week! It's Sir Bright's museum-hotel—It is said to be most luxurious! I heard it's built on a mountain, with breathtaking views, and you can even see the ocean from there!

sentenceList.speaker: Dorian Christon
sentenceList.text: It's not just the scenery… The artifacts on display there were collected by Sir Bright over five whole years. Especially—the long-lost “Ten Great Relics.” We can't afford to waste this opportunity.

sentenceList.speaker: Annabel Vesey
sentenceList.text: I am most grateful to you, Mr. Detective! It's all thanks to you helping Duke Howard with that case last time that he invited us to come along. I heard staying even one night at that hotel doesn't come cheap!

sentenceList.speaker: Dorian Christon
sentenceList.text: You helped quite a bit with that last case too. Without you, it would've been tricky indeed… I confess, I am quite ignorant in the field of medicine.

sentenceList.speaker: coachman
sentenceList.text: Excuse me, are you Mr. Cliston and Miss Vesey?

sentenceList.speaker: coachman
sentenceList.text: Sir Bright has arranged for me to pick you up. Please present your invitation so I can verify your identities.

sentenceList.speaker: Dorian Christon
sentenceList.text: Of course, please allow me a moment to find it.

sentenceList.speaker: coachman
sentenceList.text: Thank you, Mr. Cliston, Miss Vesey. Everything is in order. Sir Bright has made all the necessary arrangements for your journey. Please allow me to escort you to the carriage.
